titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the period for the rollover of gain from the sale of a principal residence located in a disaster area.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H698-699)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/18/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the period for the rollover of gain from the sale of a principal residence if the new principal residence is located in a disaster area.
